Hello! My name is Tommy.
I am a third year computer science student at Georgia Tech. Here's a bit about myself:
  • I am passionate about software development and data science and I just started my BSMS degree in Machine Learning.
  • My paper on bathymetric LiDAR data analysis was accepted to the SPIE DCS Conference!
  • I am a tech member for Georgia Tech's Hackathon club. I am developing websites for streaming virtual events during Covid-19.
  • I am the secretary of Rotorjackets, a drone flying club. We just founded the club this year and things are getting exciting!
  • I am interested in guitar, cooking, hiking, videogames and flying drones.
